entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
